blogPost.excerpt: Paragon Connect allows developers to embed user-facing SaaS integrations into their product in minutes. Setup the Paragon SDK once and instantly integrate your product with popular SaaS apps like Salesforce, HubSpot, Slack, JIRA, and more.
blogPost.body: Paragon Connect allows developers to embed user-facing SaaS integrations into their product in minutes. Setup the Paragon SDK once and instantly integrate your product with popular SaaS apps like Salesforce, HubSpot, Slack, JIRA, and more.
blogPost.title: Paragon Connect - Build embedded, native SaaS integrations in minutes
blogPost.author: Brandon Foo

localize.description: Paragon Connect允许开发人员在几分钟内将面向用户的SaaS集成嵌入到他们的产品中。只需设置一次Paragon SDK，就可以立即将您的产品与Salesforce、HubSpot、Slack、JIRA等流行的SaaS应用集成。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内构建嵌入式的原生SaaS集成。

localize.description: Paragon Connect允許開發人員在幾分鐘內將面向用戶的SaaS集成嵌入到他們的產品中。只需設置一次Paragon SDK，就可以立即將您的產品與Salesforce、HubSpot、Slack、JIRA等流行的SaaS應用集成。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內構建嵌入式的原生SaaS集成。
